text.sentence: Mark - Would you be available to sit down with me Monday morning (say beginning at 10:30) to go over the spreadsheet?
I have quite a few comments on the financial transaction items that I was able to understand and several questions on areas I haven't yet been able to decipher.
I am particularly concerned about the Weather Products generally and the Floating Prices for all financial products (the Index tab).
If you could let me or my assistant know so I can work out my calendar for the day I'd appreciate it (I've blocked out 2 hours but it might not take that long).
Unfortunately I'm leaving town mid-afternoon so I have to get these wrapped up.
p.s. - It might make sense to have somebody from the Confirmation Desk come too - what do you think?
